recipe.title: Farfalle with Tomatoes and Feta Cheese
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds farfalle or bow tie pasta
instructions: 1. Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. 2. Combine the pasta, tomatoes, olives, onions, capers, cheese, and basil. Pour on the vinaigrette and toss lightly.
